alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 4:20PM CDT until August 25 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Frontier County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 419 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located Just east of Stockville, or 12 miles southeast of Curtis, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Orafino, Freedom and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
